entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use Pattern Matching suggestion gives faulty code #72370
    Backlog
  • MetadataImportOptions.All doesn't work in source generators? #72369
  • CSharpScript.RunAsync fail with exception System.NotSupportedException: A non-collectible assembly may not reference a collectible assembly #72366

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Lazy work #72368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove a field from MultiDictionary.ValueSet #72367
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay create the SkeletonReferenceCache #72365
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Small allocation optimization in StateTable.Builder.ToImmutable #72364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #72304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find usage message severity #72326
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #72305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Roslyn non-source-only build fixes #72360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
